text: Taobao privacy policy
Update date: [2022] Year [04] month [02] Day
label: Policy Change

text: 【introduction】
You are welcome to use our products and services!

We know the importance of personal information to you. Your trust is very important to us. We will strictly abide by laws and regulations to take corresponding security protection measures to protect your personal information security and controlling.

Based on this, Taobao's service provider (or "we") formulates this "Taobao Privacy Policy" (hereinafter referred to as "this policy"/"this privacy policy") to help you fully understand the use of our products and services in your product and service.In the process, how will we collect, use, share, store, and protect your personal information, as well as how you can manage your personal information so that you can make better choices.

Before you start using our products and services, please read and understand this policy carefully. In particular, we should focus on reading the clauses we logging in the threatening of the body/coarse body to ensure that you fully understand and agree to use it before starting to use.
The professional vocabulary involved in this policy, we try to explain to you in a concise and popular expression in order to facilitate your understanding.
If you have any questions, opinions or suggestions on the content of this policy, you can contact us through the contact information at the end of this policy.

You agree that the privacy policy said that you have understood the functions provided by the application, and the necessary personal information required for functional operation, and give corresponding collection and use authorization, but it does not mean that you have agreed to open up additional functions and handle non -necessary personal information.The opening, processing non -necessary personal information and processing sensitive personal information, we will solicit your consent separately according to your actual usage.
label: Policy Change
Important
rewrite: You agree that the privacy policy said that you need to understand the necessary personal information you need to collect functions and authorize, but it does not mean that you agree to open up additional functions and handle non -necessary personal information. We will solicit your consent separately.

text: This privacy policy will help you understand the following:
1. Scope of application
2. Information collection and use
3. Provide information to the outside world
Fourth, your rights
5. Storage of information
6. Policy update
7. Protection of minors
Eight, contact us
Appendix: Related Definition
1. Scope of application
This policy is applicable to the products and services provided by the Taobao service providers with new forms provided to you with new forms that emerge with technology development.

For example, we use Taobao's products or services in the products or services of affiliated companies (such as logging in with Taobao platform accounts), but those who have not set up independent privacy policies will also apply for this part of the product or service.

We and affiliated companies have a privacy policy for the products or services that they provided to you (such as "Tmall Privacy Policy" and "Flying Pig Privacy Policy"), and the corresponding privacy policy is applicable to the corresponding products or services.

In addition to the relevant information collection and use activities described by this policy, this policy is not applicable to other services you provided by Taobao sellers and other third directions. Other services apply to the personal information collection and use rules that they explain to you.
For example, when you join the seller or brand member, the use of such sellers or brands to use the rules that they specifically explained to you.
2. Information collection and use
When you use our products/services, the personal information we need/may need to collect and use includes the following:
label: First Party Collection Information

text: 1. In order to realize the basic functions of providing you with our products and/or services, you must authorize us to collect and use the necessary information.
label: First Party Collection Information

text: If you refuse to provide the corresponding information, you will not be able to use our products and/or services normally;
label: First Party Collection Information

text: 2. In order to provide you with additional functions to our products and/or services, you can choose to agree or disagree with the information we collected and used alone.
label: First Party Collection Information

text: If you refuse to provide it, you will not be able to use related additional functions normally or cannot achieve the functional effects we intend to achieve, which will not affect your basic functions.
label: First Party Collection Information

text: We are here to remind you that we are committed to creating a variety of products and services to meet your needs.

Because there are many types and services we provide to you, and there are differences in the scope of the specific product/service selected by different users, the basic/additional functions and the personal information types and scope of personal information and use will be different. Please use specific ones.Product/service function shall prevail.
The specific feature scenarios we will provide you include::
(1) Help you become our member and account management
1. Basic member service
We provide you based on Taobao platform accounts.
In order to create Taobao platform accounts, you need to provide us with at least your mobile phone number, the membership name and password you want to use.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: To create an account, you need to provide your mobile phone number, the membership name and password you are going to use.

text: If you refuse to provide the above information, you will not be able to register the Taobao platform account, you can only use browsing and search services.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: If you do not provide your mobile phone number, the membership name and password you want to use, you can only use browsing and search services.

text: We will determine your current level based on the use of your Taobao platform account and the account level computing rules set by the platform, and provide you with the basic equity corresponding to the corresponding account level.
label: Important
Usage
rewrite: Determine your level based on your Taobao platform account usage and calculation rules, and provide you with basic rights and interests.

text: 2. Additional member service
Special membership rights: If you choose to fill in the real name, gender, date of birth, residence, nickname, avatar, we can provide you with membership privilege services.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: If you choose to fill in the real name, gender, date of birth, place of residence, nickname, avatar, you can provide you with membership privilege services.

text: Among them, the nicknames and avatars you set will be displayed publicly.
label: Third Party Sharing/ Disclosure
Important
rewrite: The nicknames and avatars you set will be displayed publicly.

text: Authorized login: We may provide your account information (avatar, nickname, and other pages prompt information) to third parties after you agree, so that you can easily implement the registration of third -party accounts or directly log in.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: We may provide your account information to the third party with a separate consent to facilitate your registration of a third -party account or log in directly in a third party.

text: In addition, we may obtain your third -party account information from a third party based on your individual consent and bind it with your Taobao platform account, so that you can log in to the third party and use our products and/or orServe.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: You can obtain your third -party account information from a third party and bind it with your Taobao platform account, so that you can log in, use products and/or services directly in the third party.

text: We will use your relevant information within the scope of the authorization you agree with.
label: Usage

text: If you already have a Taobao platform account, we may display your above personal information in the Taobao platform service, and the operations that you perform on the Taobao platform or associated with the Taobao platform account (you can via the Taobao platformAccounts use the link entrances or other products/service entrances provided by our website or client to use products or services provided by/or related companies), including displaying your personal data, preferential rights, and transaction orders through Taobao platform accounts.
label: Important
Usage
rewrite: If you already have a Taobao platform account, you will display your personal information, preferential rights, transaction orders and other information in the Taobao platform service, as well as your operation.

text: We will respect your choices of Taobao platform services and Taobao platform account settings.
label: Edit/Control

text: 3. Authentication

In order to meet relevant laws and regulations and regulatory requirements, ensure the authenticity of the user's identity, and achieve anti -fraud, such as risk control, guarantee system and service security, when you use specific services/functions, we need to collect your relevant information for identity verification, such as:
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Data Security
Usage
rewrite: When you use a specific service/function, we need to collect your relevant information for authentication to meet the regulatory requirements and ensure service security.

text: [Retrieve account] When you use the "Return to Taobao Account" function, we may collect your identity information, including your real name and identity document number, to prove your identity, help you find the Taobao platform accountEssence
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: When you use the "Retrieve Taobao Account" function, we may collect your identity information to prove your identity.

text: [Account Enhancement Protection] When you use your account to enhance the protection function, you can choose to submit facial recognition information or sound lines to open face sweep verification and sound verification. Refusing to provide the aforementioned sensitive personal information will only make you unable to use the corresponding function, but no, noIt affects your normal use of other functions.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: When you use your account to enhance the protection function, you can choose to submit facial recognition information or sound lines to open face sweep verification and sound verification.

text: [Real -name/actual authentication] Based on a member role (such as sellers, content creators) and other scenarios based on the requirements of special types of goods or service transactions, application for additional identity certification requirementsThe need for equity, cracking down on telecommunications network fraud, deduction of personal income tax, administrative law enforcement or relevant subjects in administrative law enforcement or judicial litigation), you need to make real -name or real person certification.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: In order to achieve a member role of special types of goods or service transactions, the application of additional identity certification, and other scenarios that need to verify the true identity of the user in accordance with the law, you need to perform real -name or real person certification.

text: In order to achieve the purpose of certification, you need to actively provide relevant real identity information (name, document number and other documents or facial recognition information, which may be different according to the actual situation, subject to page prompts) and authorize us to pass the national authority and credible identity certificationThe agency conducts information verification, or authorizes us to obtain the necessary certification information of your Binding Alipay account from the Alipay Company. We will record, save the certification information and certification results in accordance with the law.Uses will not be used as other purposes without your authorization.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: You need to take the initiative to provide real identity information and authorize us to conduct information verification through the national authoritative and credible authentication agency, or authorize us to obtain your necessary certification information from Alipay to achieve the purpose of certification, and if you are authorized, you will not use it.Do other purposes.

text: In addition, when you participate in the promotion and interactive activities on the platform, we need to check the real -name authentication status of the Alipay account that you binding the Alipay account is used to verify your basic participation conditions and ensure your activities.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: When you participate in promotion and interactive activities, you need to check the real -name authentication status of your Alipay account to Alipay to verify the basic participation conditions.

text: (2) Show you product or service information to you

To show you the product or service information, including your access footprint and historical search situation, we will collect and use your browsing and search records when you visit or use the Taobao platform website or client.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: Collect and use your browsing and search records when you visit or use the Taobao platform website or client to show you displayed goods or service information.

text: We will combine equipment information, service log information collected in accordance with the law, and other information that get your authorization to predict your preference characteristics through algorithm models.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: Use collected equipment information, service log information, and other information you authorized to predict your preferences.

text: We will push you a business advertisement and other information that you may be interested in based on your preferences, or send you commercial short information to you.
label: Important
Usage
rewrite: Based on your preferences to push you commercial advertisements and other information, or send you commercial short information.

text: We will also use statistical analysis of the hot spots, trends and trends of Taobao platform users to browse, search for products or services, use sorting selection algorithms to form related lists, and recommend it to you.
label: Important
Usage
rewrite: Based on the statistical analysis of the hotspots, trends and trends of Taobao platform users browsing, searching for products or services, using a selected class algorithm to form a selected list, and recommend it to you.

text: Personalized recommendations and retrieval algorithms will predict your preferences based on the model, match the products, services or other information you may be interested in, and sort the products, services or other information displayed to you.
label: Important
Usage
rewrite: Personalized recommendations and retrieval algorithms will predict your preferences based on model prediction, and match products, services or other information you may be interested in.

text: We will give real -time feedback on the recommendation model based on the browsing behavior of your product, and constantly adjust the optimization results.
label: Important
Usage
rewrite: According to your browsing behavior, real -time feedback on the recommendation model, and constantly adjust the optimization results.

text: In order to meet your diverse needs, we will introduce diversified recommendation technologies during the sorting process, expand the recommended content, and avoid excessive concentration of the same type of content.
At the same time, we strive to ensure your privacy experience through the following measures:
1. If you want to delete your browsing and search records, you can choose to delete in "My Taobao-Footprint" and "Search Box-History Search";
label: Edit/Control
Important
rewrite: You can choose to delete your browsing and search records in "My Taobao-Footprint" and "Search Box-History Search".

text: 2. If you don't want to accept the commercial advertisement we send to you, you can reply or close the withdrawal or other ways we provided by the SMS prompt;
label: Important
Edit/Control
rewrite: Replied to the withdrawal or other methods provided by the SMS prompt for a copy or closing the commercial advertisement.

text: 3. If you need to check the sorting of your personal characteristics when using the site search service you provide, you can click "Filter" on the search results page, select the "sales volume", "price", "universal sorting"Settings;
label: Important
Edit/Control
rewrite: You can click "Filter" on the search results page, and select the "sales volume", "price" and "general sorting" in it to set the settings to check the sorting of personal characteristics.

text: 4. If you don't want to see the products or services recommended for you on the homepage or enter the payment page, you can select the product or service picture of the recommended product or service, select a shielding similar product or in the subsequent pop -up window according to the prompt or the prompts or similar products or similar products or similar products or in the prompts.Categories of goods or services;
label: Edit/Control
Important
rewrite: You can choose the category of similar products or services or services according to the prompts in the subsequent pop -up window.

text: 5. If you want to manage the personalized advertisements we send to you, you can set it in "My Taobao-Settings-Privacy Settings-Advertising Management".
label: Important
Edit/Control
rewrite: Personalized advertising settings are performed in "My Taobao-Settings-Privacy Settings-Advertising Management".

text: 6. If you want to manage the personalized content we push you, you can set it in "My Taobao-Settings-Privacy Settings-Recommended Management".
label: Edit/Control
Important
rewrite: Personalized content push settings can be performed in "My Taobao-Settings-Privacy Settings-Recommended Management".

text: (3) Provide you with the functions of collection, purchase, attention and sharing

In the process of visiting our website or client, you can choose to collect the products and/or services that are interested in, add to the shopping cart, establish a attention relationship with the merchant/brand/other members you are interested in, through the provided by us provided by usFunctional components share product/service information from third -party.

In the process of using the above functions, we will collect the records of your collection and adding a shopping cart, focusing on relationships, and sharing service log information, including history to achieve the above functions and other purposes we have clearly notified.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: Collect the recording of your collection and adding shopping carts, focusing relationships, and sharing service log information including history to provide you with the functions of collecting, adding purchase, attention and sharing.

text: You can check or manage your collection and purchase information in the collection clip, shopping cart.
label: Edit/Control
Important
rewrite: You can view or manage your collection and purchase information in the collection clip, shopping cart.

text: (4) Help you complete the order and order management
When you order specific products and/or services in our products and/or services, we will generate orders for you to buy the product and/or service for you through the system.
label: Important
Usage
rewrite: When you order specific products and/or services, we will generate orders for you to purchase the product and/or service for you through the system.

text: In the process of ordering, you need to provide at least your consignee's name, delivery address, and consignee contact phone number. For some special types of goods and services, you also need to provide other information necessary for the product or service, such as involving it involvedYou need to provide your identity information during cross -border transactions to complete customs clearance.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: In the process of placing an order, you need to provide at least your consignee's name, the delivery address, and the telephone number of the consignee. In special cases, you need to provide other necessary information.

text: At the same time, this order will contain the goods and/or service information you purchased, the specific order number, the time of order creation, the amount you should pay, your remarks information.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: Your order contains the goods and/or service information you purchased, the specific order number, the time of order creation, the amount you should pay, your remarks information.

text: We collect this information to help you successfully complete the transaction, ensure your transaction security, facilitate your inquiry of order information, provide customer service and after -sales service and other purposes that we clearly notify.
label: Important
Usage
rewrite: Collect order information to help you complete the transaction smoothly, ensure your transaction security, facilitate your inquiry of order information, provide customer service and after -sales service, and other purposes that we clearly notify.

text: You can order goods and/or services for others through Taobao. You need to provide the aforementioned personal information of the actual consignee and ensure that the actual consignee has obtained.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: When ordering goods and/or services for others, you need to provide personal information of actual consignee and ensure that the actual consignee has obtained the consent of the actual consignee.

text: To facilitate your understanding, query order information and manage order information, we will collect the order information you generated during our service process to display and facilitate the management of your order.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: Collect the order information you generated during the service process to display it to you and facilitate the management of your order.

text: You can fill in/select more additional information including other contact calls and receipt time to ensure the accurate delivery of goods or services.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: You can fill in/select more additional information including other contact calls and receipt time to ensure the accurate delivery of goods or services.

text: You can view and manage your order information through "My Order".
label: Important
Edit/Control
rewrite: You can view and manage your order information through "My Order".

text: (5) Help you complete the payment
To complete the order payment, you need to bind the Alipay account and choose the payment method.

We will develop your Taobao platform account member name, the corresponding Alipay account member name, order payment related information, order security related equipment information, and other necessary information required by other anti -money laundering laws through the Alipay software tools embedded in the website or client.The package (software tool development package is referred to as "SDK" in this policy) and other security methods shared with Alipay.
label: Third Party Sharing/ Disclosure
Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: Share your Taobao platform account member name, the corresponding Alipay account member name, order payment related information, order security related equipment information, and other legal requirements to share with Alipay.

text: If you choose to provide you with a payment service by other financial institutions, we will also share your bank card payment, which is valid for the bank card, and share the necessary information of bank card payment with the corresponding financial institutions you choose.
label: Third Party Sharing/ Disclosure
Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: If you choose to provide you with payment services by other financial institutions, you will share your bank card payment for the necessary information with the corresponding financial institutions.

text: You can ask others to pay for you, then you need to provide the Alipay account and/or mobile phone number of the Alipay.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: When asking others to pay for you, you need to provide the Alipay account and/or mobile phone number of the Alipay.

text: In order to allow us to learn and confirm your payment progress and status in a timely manner, and to provide you with service after -sales and dispute solutions, you agree that we can collect the transaction objects, Alipay or other financial institutions you choose.information.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: You agree that we can collect and pay the progress related information from the transaction objects, Alipay or other financial institutions you choose to learn about your payment progress and status.

text: You can check the Alipay account information bound by your Taobao platform account or apply for replacing the bound Alipay account.
label: Important
Edit/Control
rewrite: You can view the Alipay account information bound to your Taobao platform account or apply for replacement of the bound Alipay account.

text: (6) Help you complete the delivery of goods or services

In order to ensure that the goods and/or services you buy can be smooth, safe, and accurate, we will disclose the delivery information related to the order of Zhejiang Cainiao Supply Chain Management Co., Ltd. to provide logistics information systems and technical services to Taobao platforms, andProvide the main body of the main body according to the product and/or service to synchronize related distribution information to the corresponding logistics distribution subject.
label: Third Party Sharing/ Disclosure
Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: We will disclose delivery information related to order to Zhejiang Cainiao Supply Chain Management Co., Ltd., and synchronize related distribution information from the corresponding logistics distribution subject to ensure the provision and delivery of services or goods.

text: You know and agree that the corresponding logistics distribution subject will inevitably know and use your delivery information to complete the delivery purpose.
label: Important
Usage
rewrite: You know and agree that the corresponding logistics distribution subject will inevitably know and use your delivery information to complete the delivery purpose.

text: In order to provide you with the purpose of after -sales and dispute solutions, we need to learn and confirm the delivery progress and status in a timely manner. You agree that we can collect information related to the delivery progress related to the main body of logistics.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: You agree that we can collect information related to the progress of delivery from logistics -related service entities, thinking that you provide after -sales and dispute solutions.

text: (7) Customer service and dispute handling

When you contact us or propose the application for sale, after -sales, and dispute dispute handling, in order to ensure your account and system security, we need you to provide the necessary personal information to verify your membership status.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: When you contact us or propose the application for sale, after -sales, and dispute dispute processing, you need to provide the necessary personal information for your identity verification.

text: In order to facilitate the processing plan and results of helping you solve the problem or record related issues as soon as possible, we may preserve your communication, communication/call records and related content (including account information, order information, to prove the relevant related to related related to the relevantOther information provided by the facts, or the contact information you leave).
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: We may save your communication, communication/call records and related content with us in order to contact you, help you solve the problem or record the processing plan and results.

text: If you consult, complain or provide suggestions for specific orders, we will use your account information and order information.
label: Important
Usage
rewrite: If you consult, complain or provide suggestions for specific orders, we will use your account information and order information.

text: In order to provide reasonable needs of services and improve service quality, other information we may also use, including the relevant information you provided when you contact the customer service, the questionnaire answering information you sent to us during the questionnaire survey.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage

text: We will use deep learning technology to provide you with intelligent Q & A dialogue and intelligent voice customer service services.

It is necessary to identify the communication, communication/call records and related content of you, and use it for the training of smart customer service algorithm models without identifying your identity.

First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: It is identified to communicate with us to communicate, communicate/call records and related content, and use it for training for smart customer service algorithms.

text: We will make a significant prompt to you during your time for smart customer service.
We will continuously improve the quality of smart customer service based on your smart customer service records.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: Based on your intelligent customer service records, the service quality of smart customer service is constantly improving.

text: (8) Provide you with information disclosure release function

You can use the comments, Q & A, forum, personal homepage, live broadcast, Taoyou circle, and other information release functions that we provide for you. Select publicly publish graphic/video/live content, publish evaluation and Q & A contentCommodities to leisure fish, as well as the seller's release of goods and/or service related information, store -related information.
label: Edit/Control
Important
rewrite: You can choose to publicly publish graphic/video/live content, publish evaluation and Q & A content, one -click to sell purchased products to idle fish, and publish products and/or service related information and store -related information as sellers.

text: We respect and protect your settings of the relevant information and the scope of the release.
We may judge whether you can enjoy the corresponding information release function permissions based on your membership type and network log information.
label: Important
Usage
rewrite: According to your membership type and network log information, judge whether you can enjoy the corresponding information release function authority.

text: Please note that the information you publish may involve your or other people's personal information and even sensitive personal information. If you choose to upload pictures containing personal information when evaluating.
label: Important
rewrite: Please note that the information you publish may involve your or other people's personal information and even sensitive personal information.

text: Please consider whether to share or even publicly share relevant information when using our services.
label: Important
rewrite: Please consider whether to share or even share relevant information.

text: If you involve the personal information of others in your public release, you need to obtain the consent of others before the release.
label: Important
rewrite: If you involve the personal information of others in your public release, you need to obtain the consent of others before the release.

text: (9) Provide you with security

In order to fulfill the statutory obligations to ensure the security of e -commerce transactions, improve the security of your use of services provided by us and our affiliated companies and partners, protect the safety of personal property of you or other users or the public, and better prevent fishing websites.Fraud, network vulnerabilities, computer viruses, network attacks, network invasion risks, and more accurately identify the cases that violate laws and regulations or Taobao related agreements and rules.Information, service log information, and may use or integrate your member information, transaction information, equipment information, service log information, and information that our affiliated companies and partners obtain your authorization or sharing according to law (Among them, we may be in the background of the application background in the background of the application.Collect the MAC address, IMEI and other device identifiers for risk verification during the operation period) to comprehensively judge your account and transaction risk, authenticate, test and prevent security incidents, and take necessary records, audit, analysis, and disposal measures in accordance with the law.Essence
label: Third Party Sharing/ Disclosure
Important
First Party Collection Information
Data Security
Usage
rewrite: We use the application security SDK developed by related companies to collect your equipment information, service log information, and use or integrate your membership information, trading information, equipment information, service log information, and judgeYour account and transaction risk, authentication, testing and prevention of security incidents, and take records, audit, analysis, and disposal measures.

text: (10) Other additional services provided for you
1. Additional services based on system permissions

To provide you with more convenient, better, personalized products and/or services, and strive to improve your experience, we may collect and use your personal information by opening system permissions in the following additional services.
label: First Party Collection Information

text: If you do not agree to start the relevant authority, it will not affect your basic services using Taobao, but you may not get the user experience brought by these additional services to you.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: If you do not agree to start the relevant authority, it will not affect the use of the basic services of Taobao, but you may use additional services.

text: You can check the status of the above permissions in your device "settings" or our client "My Taobao-Settings-Privacy-System permissions", and you can determine that these permissions are open or closed at any time.
label: Important
Edit/Control
rewrite: You can check the state of permissions in the device "setting" or our client "My Taobao-Settings-Privacy-System permissions", and you can determine that these permissions are open or closed at any time.

text: Please note that when you start the right of power, it means that you authorize us to collect and use relevant personal information to provide you with corresponding services. Once you turn off the right of power, it means that you cancel the authorization.With relevant personal information, you cannot continue to provide you with the service corresponding to the permissions.
label: Permission Acquisition
Important
rewrite: The opening of one authority means that the authorization is authorized to collect and use the relevant information to provide corresponding services. Close the authority to cancel the authorization representative, and no longer continue to collect and use relevant information based on the corresponding permissions.

text: The decision of your closure authority will not affect the collection and use of information based on your authorization.
label: Permission Acquisition
Important
rewrite: Close authority will not affect the collection and use of information based on authorization.

text: You can click here to view the application authority application and usage description.
label: Permission Acquisition
Important
rewrite: You can click here to view the application authority application and usage description.

text: 2. Cookie and services of similar technologies
Cookie and similar device information identification technology are commonly used in the Internet.

When you use our service, we may use related technologies to send one or more, cookie, or anonymous identifiers (hereinafter referred to as "Cookie") to collect, identify and store your access, use this product, use this productInformation about time.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: When you use your service, use cookies to collect, identify and store your information when you access and use this product.

text: We promise that cookies will not be used for any other purposes other than the purpose of this privacy policy.

We use, cookies, mainly to ensure the safety and efficient operation of products and services, allow us to confirm the security status of your account and transaction, check the relevant abnormal situation of collapse and delay, and help you save you to fill in the form, enter the search contentSteps and processes.
label: Important
Usage
rewrite: In order to ensure the security of products and services, to confirm the security status of accounts and transactions, check the abnormal situation, and help you simplify the use process.

text: At the same time, we may use, cookie, show you the information or function you may be interested in, and optimize your choice of advertising.
label: Important
Usage
rewrite: Use Cookie to show you the information or functions you may be interested in.

text: Most browsers provide users with the function of removing the browser cache data. You can perform the corresponding data clearing operation, or you can modify the degree of acceptance of cookies or reject our cookies.
label: Important
Edit/Control
rewrite: You can remove the browser cache data through the browser settings, or you can modify the degree of acceptance of cookies or reject cookies.

text: You may not be able to use services or corresponding functions that depend on cookies because of these modifications.
label: Important
Edit/Control

text: (11) Other rules of collecting and using personal information

You can contact the full -time department of personal information protection through [pipwg@service.alibaba.com] (please indicate that it is related to [Taobao] and explain the specific facts), and office address: [Yuhang District, Hangzhou City Yichi 1Flooring on the first floor of Building No. 4, No. 969, West Road].

text: It should be noted that we may not reply to the issue that has nothing to do with the right to this policy or your personal information.
label: Important
Contact Information
rewrite: Please note that we may not reply to the problem that has nothing to do with the right to this policy or your personal information.

text: If you are not satisfied with our reply, especially if you think our personal information processing behavior has harm your legitimate rights and interests, you can also seek solutions by filed a lawsuit to a court with jurisdiction in the place of residence in the defendant.
Appendix: Related Definition
Taobao: Refers to Taobao (domain name taobao.com) website and Taobao client.
Taobao service provider: refers to Taobao's Internet information and software technology service providers Zhejiang Taobao Network Co., Ltd., Taobao (China) Software Co., Ltd.
Related company: Refers to the related company of Taobao platform service providers disclosed by the latest listed company annual report of Alibaba Group Holding Limited.
Alipay: Refers to the main Alipay (China) Network Technology Co., Ltd. providing Alipay services.
Personal information: Various information related to the recognized or recognized natural persons recorded in electronics or other ways, excluding information after anonymous processing.

Sensitive personal information: Once sensitive personal information is leaked or illegally, it is easy to lead to personal information that is harmful to natural person's personality dignity or personality and property security.Track information, and personal information of minors under the age of 14.
Child: Refers to minors under the age of 14.

Equipment information: Including device identifiers (IMEI, IDFA, Android ID, Mac, OAID, IMSI and other device -related information), application information (application crash information, notification switch status, application installation list, and other application related information), equipment parameters), equipment parametersAnd system information (device type, device model, operating system and hardware -related information), device network environment information (IP address, WIFI information, base station information and other network -related information).
The actual collection of the product shall prevail.

Service log information: Including browsing records, click to view records, search query records, collection, add to shopping carts, transactions, after -sales, follow sharing information, publishing information, and IP address, browser type, telecommunications operator, use language, access, accessDate and time.
Decoration: Refers to the process of personal information processing, so that it cannot recognize specific natural persons without using additional information.
Anonymous: Refers to the process that personal information cannot identify specific natural persons and cannot recover.
